participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, with a strong sense of resilience.
participant_1.background: I am a cancer survivor. My parents were both very athletic. I got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. I am a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Jamie Smith
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, with a passion for music and the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I started playing guitar when I was three. I grew up in the industry. We spent summers ringing at national parks. I'm a country music singer.

hey it is good.how is yours?
I am doing well. Just got done with my girlfriend. Are you a clean eater?
yeah i don't consume processed sugar
You are funny, i have not had cancer, but i am not good at it.
yeah i am bad at getting cancer too
I am sorry to hear that cancer cancer cancer cancer. Are you a cancer survivor?
no man lets change the subject
I am sure you will. I am a recovering from my job.
I have never been to a good jazz tattoo. I am more of a homebody.
i started playing guitar when i was three
